verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me, \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w get|strong="H7069"\w* thee a \w linen|strong="H6593"\w* \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* it upon thy \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w put|strong="H0935"\w* it not in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

So I \w got|strong="H7069"\w* a \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* on my \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*.
And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* that thou hast \w got|strong="H7069"\w*, which \add is\add* upon thy \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*, and \w hide|strong="H2934"\w* it there in a \w hole|strong="H5357"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*.
So I \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* it by \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* me.

And it came to pass \w after|strong="H7093"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* from thence, which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee to \w hide|strong="H2934"\w* there.

Then I \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*, and \w digged|strong="H2658"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* from the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where I had \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* it: and, behold, the \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* was \w marred|strong="H7843"\w*, it was \w profitable|strong="H6743"\w* for nothing.
Then the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, After this manner will I \w mar|strong="H7843"\w* the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

This \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which \w refuse|strong="H3987"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, which \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them, and to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* them, shall even be as this \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w*, which is \w good|strong="H6743"\w* for nothing.\f + \fr 13.10 \ft imagination: or, stubbornness\f*

For as the \w girdle|strong="H0232"\w* \w cleaveth|strong="H1692"\w* to the \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, so have I caused to \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto me the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; that they might be unto me for a \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and for a \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and for a \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*, and for a \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*: but they would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.

¶ Therefore thou shalt \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto them this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*; Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Every \w bottle|strong="H5035"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*: and they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, Do we not \w certainly|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that every \w bottle|strong="H5035"\w* shall be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*?

Then shalt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I will \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, even the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* that \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, with \w drunkenness|strong="H7943"\w*.

And I will \w dash|strong="H5310"\w* them \w one|strong="H0376"\w* against \w another|strong="H0251"\w*, even the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: I will not \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*, nor \w spare|strong="H2347"\w*, nor have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*, but \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* them.\f + \fr 13.14 \ft one…: Heb. a man against his brother\f*\f + \fr 13.14 \ft but…: Heb. from destroying them\f*
¶ \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye, and give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*; be not \w proud|strong="H1361"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, before he cause \w darkness|strong="H2821"\w*, and before your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w stumble|strong="H5062"\w* upon the \w dark|strong="H5399"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and, while ye \w look|strong="H6960"\w* for \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, he \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* it into the shadow of \w death|strong="H6757"\w*, \add and\add* \w make|strong="H7896"\w* \add it\add* gross \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*.

But if ye will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* it, my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* in secret \w places|strong="H4565"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \add your\add* \w pride|strong="H1466"\w*; and mine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w weep|strong="H1830"\w* \w sore|strong="H1830"\w*, and run \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, because the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* is carried away \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and to the \w queen|strong="H1377"\w*, \w Humble|strong="H8213"\w* yourselves, sit \w down|strong="H3427"\w*: for your \w principalities|strong="H4761"\w* shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \add even\add* the \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of your \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*.\f + \fr 13.18 \ft principalities: or, head tires\f*

The \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* shall be shut \w up|strong="H5462"\w*, and none shall \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \add them:\add* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall be carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* all of it, it shall be \w wholly|strong="H7965"\w* carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w*.

Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* them that \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*: where \add is\add* the \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* \add that\add* was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee, thy \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*?

What wilt thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* when he shall \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* thee? for thou hast \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* them \add to be\add* \w captains|strong="H0441"\w*, \add and\add* as \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* over thee: shall not \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* \w take|strong="H0270"\w* thee, as a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*?\f + \fr 13.21 \ft punish: Heb visit upon\f*

¶ And if thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, Wherefore \w come|strong="H7122"\w* these things upon me? For the \w greatness|strong="H7230"\w* of thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* are thy \w skirts|strong="H7757"\w* \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w*, \add and\add* thy \w heels|strong="H6119"\w* made \w bare|strong="H2554"\w*.\f + \fr 13.22 \ft made…: or, shall be violently taken away\f*

Can the \w Ethiopian|strong="H3569"\w* \w change|strong="H2015"\w* his \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, or the \w leopard|strong="H5246"\w* his \w spots|strong="H2272"\w*? \add then\add* \w may|strong="H3201"\w* ye also do \w good|strong="H3190"\w*, that are \w accustomed|strong="H3928"\w* to do \w evil|strong="H7489"\w*.\f + \fr 13.23 \ft accustomed: Heb. taught\f*
Therefore will I \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* them as the \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w* that passeth \w away|strong="H5674"\w* by the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

This \add is\add* thy \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, the \w portion|strong="H4490"\w* of thy \w measures|strong="H4055"\w* from me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; because thou hast \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* me, and \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*.
Therefore will I \w discover|strong="H2834"\w* thy \w skirts|strong="H7757"\w* upon thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, that thy \w shame|strong="H7036"\w* may \w appear|strong="H7200"\w*.

I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* thine \w adulteries|strong="H5004"\w*, and thy \w neighings|strong="H4684"\w*, the \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* of thy \w whoredom|strong="H2184"\w*, \add and\add* thine \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* on the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*. \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto thee, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*! wilt thou not be made \w clean|strong="H2891"\w*? when \add shall it\add* \w once|strong="H5750"\w* \add be\add*?\f + \fr 13.27 \ft when…: Heb. after when yet?\f*
